name: HMCameraSnapshotControlDelegate
desc: A set of methods used to observe the camera's snapshot activity.

items.name: func cameraSnapshotControl(HMCameraSnapshotControl, didTake: HMCameraSnapshot?, error: Error?)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the camera has taken a new snapshot.

items.name: func cameraSnapshotControlDidUpdateMostRecentSnapshot(HMCameraSnapshotControl)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the most recent snapshot has been updated.
